is_mongodbgov_cloud.description: MongoDB Atlas Base URL default to gov

duration.description: The duration, between 15 minutes and 12 hours, of the role session. Valid time units are ns, us (or Âµs), ms, s, h, or m.

duration_seconds.description: The duration, in seconds, of the role session.

external_id.description: A unique identifier that might be required when you assume a role in another account.

policy.description: IAM Policy JSON describing further restricting permissions for the IAM Role being assumed.

policy_arns.description: Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of IAM Policies describing further restricting permissions for the IAM Role being assumed.

role_arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM Role to assume prior to making API calls.

session_name.description: An identifier for the assumed role session.

source_identity.description: Source identity specified by the principal assuming the role.

transitive_tag_keys.description: Assume role session tag keys to pass to any subsequent sessions.

backup_enabled.description: Clusters running MongoDB FCV 4.2 or later and any new Atlas clusters of any type do not support this parameter
